name: cobropago
description: A powerful expense and income manager

scripts.browser-sync: browser-sync start --files " cobropago/web/static/bundles/*.css, cobropago/web/static/bundles/*.js, cobropago/**/*.py, cobropago/web/templates/*.html" --proxy 127.0.0.1:8000 --reload-delay=300 --reload-debounce=500
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "npm run css-watch" "python manage.py runserver" "npm run browser-sync"

author: Luis Fernando Barrera
